findings.title: Unprotected approve Function
findings.description: The approve function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in transfer function.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables
findings.description: The constructor does not initialize the 'owner' variable.
